People on social media are taking things to the next level! @AustralianLabor may need to watch out as many Australians are feeling left behind due to big #MP salaries. But the drama doesn't end there, as @username just called out Kate, calling it a spiralling cluster fuck. Who knows what's next in this wild ride? Stay tuned to find out!
